EtsyAlgorithmKnowledgeBase_2025.data_sources: Etsy official documentation, eRank, Marmalead, industry analysis 2024-2025

insights: Query matching: Exact keyword matches in titles, tags, attributes, and descriptions rank higher than partial matches
Listing Quality Score combines CTR, conversion rate, favorites, and sales velocity as primary ranking signal
Customer & Marketplace Experience Score includes review ratings, message response rate (<24hrs critical), on-time shipping, and case/defect rates from past 3 months
Shipping price now ranking factor: US domestic listings under $6 receive visibility boost (October 2024 update)
Star Seller metrics (on-time shipping, message response, order completion) influence ranking indirectly through quality signals

categories.impact: Critical - 44.5% of sales via app, algorithm is behavior-driven
insights: Etsy app accounts for 44%+ of GMS; mobile-first, feed-style discovery now primary shopping method
AI analyzes clicks, favorites, add-to-cart actions, dwell time, and hover behavior to personalize search results per user
Machine learning ranks listings based on individual buyer's past browsing history, purchases, and real-time session behavior
Algorithm uses computer vision and NLP to classify products by style/aesthetic even without explicit description terms
Personalized feeds prioritize listings with high engagement from similar buyer profiles
Curated collections powered by ML expand visibility beyond traditional keyword search

categories.impact: Critical - First ranking factor in mobile/app experience
insights: Minimum 2000 pixels width required; listings under this flagged and deprioritized
5+ high-quality photos strongly recommended; CEO suggested fewer images may be deprioritized
First thumbnail image is critical for CTR; must stand out in feed and communicate product instantly
NO collages or text overlays in images - actively discouraged, algorithm deprioritizes these
Lifestyle context photos increase buyer confidence and dwell time more than plain white backgrounds
Multiple angles and detail close-ups improve engagement and conversion rates
Use 4:3 aspect ratio, 72 PPI resolution, clean backgrounds with good lighting
Videos showing movement or texture lift CTR and conversions

categories.impact: High - Affects query matching and relevance score
insights: Front-load titles with primary keyword while maintaining readability - first words have most weight
Use buyer intent phrases (e.g., 'gift for mom', 'personalized wedding') not just product descriptors
Tags should reinforce title keywords and include long-tail variations
Complete ALL attribute fields (material, size, color, occasion, style) - unlocks filter-based discovery
Categories and attributes auto-populate as tags - don't waste tag slots repeating these
Vary keyword usage across listings; identical terms across all listings dilutes effectiveness
Multi-word keyword phrases perform better than single words ('modern nursery print' vs 'print')
First 160 characters of description appear in search snippets - optimize for relevance

categories.impact: Critical - Directly affects ranking and visibility
insights: Good conversion rate: 1-5% (Etsy benchmark); above 3% is competitive, 4%+ is excellent
Higher conversion signals listing quality to algorithm, improving search placement over time
Each sale from a search term signals relevance, boosting future rankings for that keyword
Conversion Rate = (Orders รท Visits) ร 100 - track per listing, not just shop-wide
Competitive/rounded pricing increases CTR; value-to-price ratio must be clear
Free shipping or clear low shipping costs improve both ranking and conversion
Complete product descriptions that answer buyer questions reduce abandonment
Clear return policy required for ALL listings (even if no returns accepted) - improves trust and ranking

categories.impact: High - Primary engagement metric for algorithm
insights: Good CTR on Etsy: ~2% (2 clicks per 100 impressions)
High CTR signals listing relevance and visual appeal to algorithm
Primary thumbnail must differentiate from competitors in crowded search results
Professional photos with clear product focus outperform busy/dark images
Lifestyle imagery showing product in use increases CTR over product-only shots
Competitive pricing visible in thumbnail affects click decisions
High CTR alone doesn't guarantee sales - must also optimize for conversion
Message response time: <24 hours critical for ranking; measured over past 3 months
Average review rating directly affects shop credibility and listing visibility
On-time shipping performance tracked; late shipments harm rankings significantly
Order defect rate and case history monitored; high rates trigger ranking penalties
Processing time accuracy matters - set realistic timelines and meet them consistently
Shop age and sales history contribute to authority signals
Consistent shop activity (regular new listings, engagement) signals active seller
Algorithm now evaluates overall shop health, not just individual listing quality

categories.impact: High - Affects both conversion and ranking
insights: Reviews are powerful ranking and conversion signal - Etsy prioritizes shops with strong review history
Positive review ratings increase visibility across all shop listings
Photo reviews improve CTR on repeat impressions more than text-only reviews
Recent reviews matter more than older ones for algorithm evaluation
Reviews influence buyer trust metrics which feed into Listing Quality Score
New listings benefit from overall shop review credibility even without own reviews

categories.impact: Medium - Temporary boost, not sustainable strategy
insights: New listings get small temporary boost (few hours to few days) for algorithm to learn engagement patterns
Renewed listings get smaller boost than new listings
Boost duration depends on search volume for item category
Frequent renewal/editing NOT effective strategy - focus on quality and conversion instead
Publishing new related listings creates cross-listing engagement signals
Algorithm reset can hurt if previous data was positive - only renew when performance drops

categories.impact: Critical - Affects ranking, CTR, and conversion
insights: US domestic shipping under $6 receives ranking boost (October 2024 update)
Free shipping preferred over low-cost shipping by algorithm
High shipping costs (>$6) actively harm search rankings and buyer conversion
Use bulk pricing tool to shift shipping costs into item price if needed
Rounded/competitive pricing improves CTR vs odd pricing
Price must signal value - too low suggests poor quality, too high reduces conversions
Clearly displayed shipping cost prevents cart abandonment
Update tags for holidays and seasonal moments 2-4 weeks early for early shopper exposure
Event-relevant listings prioritized in algorithm during seasonal peaks
Use occasion-specific keywords ('Halloween decor', 'Mother's Day gift') in tags and attributes
Algorithm recognizes seasonal patterns and boosts relevant listings proactively
Trending landing page keywords from Etsy homepage drive temporary high-value traffic
Favorites signal interest even without purchase - positive algorithm indicator for future recommendations
Time on listing (dwell time) indicates relevance; longer time signals quality content
Add-to-cart actions strong conversion predictor; algorithm tracks these separately from purchases
Session depth (pages visited, items clicked) affects shop-level quality score
Bounce rate (quick exits) signals poor listing quality or mismatched expectations
Returning customers and repeat shop visits signal strong shop quality to algorithm
First 160 characters appear in search snippets - must be compelling and keyword-rich
Answer buyer questions preemptively to reduce message volume and increase conversion
Highlight benefits and use cases, not just features or materials
Natural keyword integration in descriptions improves query matching without stuffing
Clear size/dimension information reduces returns and negative reviews
Avoid keyword stuffing - algorithm actively deprioritizes repetitive/unnatural phrases (2025 update)
AI-generated descriptions flagged if generic/low-effort - must add originality and clarity

categories.impact: Medium - Indirect ranking boost through engagement
insights: External traffic from social media, blogs, Pinterest signals quality and drives engagement metrics
Off-site ads participation (if opted in) can increase visibility through Etsy's paid placement
External backlinks to shop/listings contribute to authority signals
Social proof from external platforms (Instagram following, Pinterest saves) correlates with conversion
Direct traffic from email lists/repeat customers improves overall shop health metrics

categories.impact: Medium - Affects conversion and bounce rate
insights: Out-of-stock variations harm conversion and increase bounce rate - hide unavailable options
Multiple in-stock variations signal robust inventory and increase conversion opportunities
Variation listings can rank for multiple attribute combinations (color, size) from single listing
Keep popular variations stocked - algorithm learns which sell best and prioritizes in-stock items
Clear variation presentation (photos per variant) reduces confusion and cart abandonment

categories.impact: Medium - Etsy rewards tool usage with better metrics
insights: Sales & Targeted Offers tool triggers buyer engagement via notifications and emails
Using Etsy's promotional tools signals active seller, improving algorithm perception
Etsy Ads (if profitable) generate engagement data that improves organic ranking indirectly
Consistent use of platform features correlates with better overall shop performance
Algorithm favors shops using Etsy-provided tools (shipping labels, messaging system, etc.)
44%+ of Etsy GMS comes from mobile app - optimize for mobile-first experience
Thumbnails must work at small sizes; complex images fail to convert on mobile
Feed-style browsing means first image is often only chance to capture attention
Mobile shoppers scroll fast - visual impact more important than desktop considerations
App users see personalized feeds more than search results - engagement metrics critical
Two-phase system: Query Matching (keywords, tags, attributes) then Ranking (quality, engagement, service)
Relevancy score based on exact keyword matches in title, tags, description, attributes, categories
Listing engagement (CTR, favorites, purchases) tracked in real-time to adjust rankings
Shop-level metrics now weighted more heavily - can't optimize listings in isolation
Algorithm continuously learns from buyer behavior - rankings adjust within hours to days
Personalization means same search query shows different results to different buyers
Quality over volume - one high-converting listing outperforms ten mediocre ones

critical_dos: Maintain shipping costs under $6 for US domestic orders
Upload 5+ professional photos, minimum 2000px width, no text/collages
Respond to messages within 24 hours consistently
Front-load titles with primary keywords while keeping readable
Complete ALL attribute fields for every listing
Add clear return policy to every listing
Optimize first thumbnail for mobile feed display
Track and improve conversion rate to 3%+ minimum
Build consistent positive reviews through excellent service
Use lifestyle photos showing product in context
critical_donts: Don't use text overlays or collages in listing images
Don't keyword stuff titles/descriptions - algorithm penalizes this
Don't ignore message response time - under 24hrs is critical
Don't renew listings frequently just for boost - hurts more than helps
Don't use identical keywords across all listings
Don't charge over $6 shipping for US domestic (if US seller)
Don't ship late or miss processing time estimates
Don't rely on old SEO tactics - 2025 is behavior-driven
2025_priority_focus: Mobile-first visual optimization - thumbnails must work at small sizes
Behavioral engagement - CTR and dwell time more important than keyword density
AI personalization - individual buyer history determines visibility
Shop health metrics - overall performance affects all listings
Customer service excellence - response time and reviews weighted heavily
